628280.name: ZHEROS - The forgotten land
628280.description:
"Dr.Vendetta is back! Determined to have his revenge on the ZHEROS Squad, his plot is clear as ever, become the strongest being in the universe.
Our heroes will travel across an ancient land chasing the evil doctor to stop him once and for all.

Explore a world inspired by the treasures, lands and mysteries of the east...Find new allies and guide our heroes in the final showdown to save the galaxy.

Key Features:
- A new playable character
- 8 new levels, from cities to wild areas
- A brand new vehicle ready for destruction
- New moves to expand your arsenal
- Fight powerful and mystical creatures trained to stop you at any cost
"
628280.supported_languages: 英语, 法语, 意大利语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 日语, 葡萄牙语 - 巴西, 波兰语
